The Dead by Daylight team would like your feedback in a PTB Feedback survey.

We encourage you to be as honest as possible in letting us know how you feel about the build. The information and answers provided are anonymous, not shared with any third-party, and will not be used for purposes other than survey analysis.

Access the survey HERE!
news.title: PTB FEEDBACK SURVEY

news.description:
Welcome to the Public Test Build for Mid-Chapter 18! Please read the below for a quick summary of the new content you'll find during this PTB.

For a full list of patch notes, click HERE.

FEATURES & CONTENT
New Characters
  • Added A New Killer - The Twins
  • Added a New Survivor - Élodie Rakoto


    • Visual Update
  • Visual updates to maps in Ormond and Junkyard. (Appearance rate increased for these maps)
  • Visual update to the Hatch and Totem.
  • Visual update on the Twins Lobby.


    • BUG FIXES
  • Fixed an issue that caused the player Cloud ID to be missing from the ban message.
  • Fixed an issue that caused daily rituals to be consumed even if the claim of bloodpoints for a completed daily ritual failed.
  • Fixed an issue that caused unavailable Archives cosmetics to appear on the Feature Store section if all the cosmetics were already purchased.
  • Fixed an issue that caused a short freeze when opening a chest.


    • KNOWN ISSUES
    General
  • When Victor is not controlled, the animation and sounds are work in progress.
  • During End Game Collapse, when Victor is on a Survivor's back, the Exit Gate Spikes effect are not properly blocking the Survivor.
  • Victor should not receive Bloodlust movement speed increase.
  • If a Survivor gets pounced on by Victor during the entering Locker animation, the animation is not cancelled and he still enters the locker with Victor.


    • Perks
  • Coup de Grace: Missing visual feedback when performing a modified lunge attack
  • Hoarder: The perk currently does not spawn extra chests
  • Hoarder: The perk currently does not reduce the rarity of items found in chests.
  • Oppression: The cooldown isn't properly being applied
  • Appraisal: The rummage action is affected by perks that increase unlocking speed
  • Appraisal: The score event granted upon completing the rummage action is missing its name
  • Deception: There is no audio playing when the locker door opens/closes
  • Deception: The UI does not function as intended
  • Power Struggle: The perk can't be used while actively wiggling
news.title: CHAPTER 18 PTB

news.description:
People of The Fog,

Thank you for participating in the Player Test Build!

Here's a few things to know about your save data & progress in the Player Test Build:
  • Your personal profile (save data, inventory, currencies) has been copied from the Live servers to the PTB servers on November 6th, 2020 at 11:43 AM EST. Any progress or purchases made on the Live servers after this date will not be reflected on the PTB.
  • All progress made during the PTB will not be transferred over to the Live servers.

    • You can leave feedback of your experience here:
    forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/categories/4-4-0-ptb-feedback
    See you in The Fog.

    -The Dead by Daylight team
